name: bookiebeats-companion
description: A lightweight browser extension that enhances user experience on prediction market websites
author: Bookie Beats

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:content && vite build && npm run build:browsers
scripts.build:browsers: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:safari && npm run clean:toplevel
scripts.build:chrome: mkdir -p dist/chrome && find dist -maxdepth 1 -type f -exec cp {} dist/chrome/ \; && find dist -maxdepth 1 -type d ! -name chrome ! -name firefox ! -name safari ! -name dist -exec cp -r {} dist/chrome/ \; && cp manifest.json dist/chrome/
scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -p dist/firefox && find dist -maxdepth 1 -type f -exec cp {} dist/firefox/ \; && find dist -maxdepth 1 -type d ! -name chrome ! -name firefox ! -name safari ! -name dist -exec cp -r {} dist/firefox/ \; && cp manifest-firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build:safari: mkdir -p dist/safari && find dist -maxdepth 1 -type f -exec cp {} dist/safari/ \; && find dist -maxdepth 1 -type d ! -name chrome ! -name firefox ! -name safari ! -name dist -exec cp -r {} dist/safari/ \; && cp manifest-safari.json dist/safari/manifest.json
scripts.clean:toplevel: find dist -maxdepth 1 -type f -delete && find dist -maxdepth 1 -type d ! -name 'chrome' ! -name 'firefox' ! -name 'safari' ! -name 'dist' -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../extension-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).zip .
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../../chrome-extension-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../../firefox-extension-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).zip .
scripts.package:safari: npm run build && cd dist/safari && zip -r ../../safari-extension-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).zip .
scripts.package:firefox-xpi: npm run build && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../../firefox-extension.xpi .
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
